original_title: Ruäch – Eine Reise ins jenische Europa
overview: How do you film a minority that prefers to stay invisible, when you belong to the majority? Andreas Müller and Simon Guy Fässler travelled with the Yenish for six years—all over Europe and as far as the Grisons—faithfully and empathetically filming this freedom-loving nomadic community who bear the wounds of the past.
title: Ruäch – A Journey Into Yenish Europe
